name: Kaguya (DitzieDoodle)
description:
Again, this strange dream..

After leaving the capital and all the wealth behind,  the young princess keeps having this strange dreams were the moon is calling her. Her search for answers begins in her old house next to the bamboo forrest, where she and her parents recently returned to.

Walk around, explore your surroundings and talk to tiny moon rabbits that want to play hide and seek with you. What is all this about? And who is this Moon guardian who is waiting for you at the end of the forrest?

early, early Beta of the game
